author: Laura Kusisto
title: More Renters Give Up on Buying a Home
text:
A growing percentage of apartment renters arenâ€™t interested in buying a home as affordability challenges take a bigger toll on American aspirations of homeownership.
In all, 20% of renters said they have no interest in owning a home, up from 17% in August and 13% in 2016, according to results of a semiannual survey of renters by mortgage company Freddie Mac in January.
